name: Wild Ride
storyline:
Wild Ride is a vehicular combat game made in Unity game engine presenting it's (1)possibilites and visuals . Wild Ride is (2)abolutely not Pay-To-Win in any aspect , and never will be !
Many maps in-game (and coming) , number of vehicles and amazing real-life like driving mechanics including drifting or even aerial jumps and stunts !
~Wild Ride is certainly the game you're looking for!~
summary: A fast-paced, great looking vehicle combat game where you are the one in control of the battlefield, sit behind the wheel of your ride and be quick and smart or someone else will take you out. Will you be the ultimate rider?
